name: queryDeleteRow
description: Deletes a row within a query object.

params.name: row
params.description: Index of the row to delete, starts at 1.  If a row is not specified, the last row is removed.

examples.title: Implicit deletion of the last row
examples.description: Builds a simple query and removes the last row by not specifying a row index.

examples.title: Deletes a specific row from the query
examples.description: Builds a simple query and removes one of the rows.
